content.p: Welcome to the Department of Mechanical, Materials and Manufacturing (M3) Engineering at The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus. M3 at the Malaysia campus continues to build exceptionally close relationships with industry to ensure our teaching and research has both relevance and meaning. If you are the type of person who sees something and wants to know how it works, M3 will suit you down to the ground. M3 at the Malaysia Campus is one of the best places you can pick to study, join us and youâ€™ll get excellent teaching from really enthusiastic people, in a friendly and supportive environment. As a graduate of one of the best departments in the world, your qualification from M3 will give you the freedom to choose from a range of exciting opportunities and open up many different career paths across all sectors including oil and gas, aerospace, automotive, bioengineering, marine and many more. At M3 we aim to help you become the best you can be, to prepare you for an exciting career and ensure that when you leave our campus you will be an independent professional highly sought after by employers. Learn more about our undergraduate course and programme outcomes. Learn more about our research degrees. Accredited by: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
